name: The Better Angels
body:
# Welcome

The Better Angels are a group of anarchists committed to feminist, anti-capitalist struggle who use direct action software development as a technique of liberatory resistance.

## Projects

* [Buoy](/buoy/) - A private, community-based crisis response system. Because friends don't let friends call the cops.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
